name: Nicki Maclaren
body:
Hi, My name is Nicki and I work for Magnitude Marketing, a digital marketing agency.   I was doing some research on your industry, and I landed on your website. I noticed quite a few issues that may be negatively affecting the way it ranks on Google. These issues are stopping you from getting the sales and inquiries that you should be.  
 
I have created a 12-page analysis of your website which addresses all of the technical errors I noticed. Would you like me to send you a report of my findings? Either way, it is free of cost. 
 
All I want is the opportunity to call you and discuss the website analysis in greater detail.   Are you able to speak this week? 
 
Phone is 317-215-5781 
 
Best Regards, Nicki Maclaren | Website & SEO Analyst
